Link autofills your customers\u2019 paym: Link autofills your customers’ payment and shipping details to deliver an easy and seamless checkout experience. New checkout experience needs to be enabled for Link. By enabling this feature, you agree to the {{stripeLinkTerms}}Link by Stripe terms{{/stripeLinkTerms}}, and {{privacyPolicy}}Privacy Policy{{/privacyPolicy}}.
Boost sales by offering a fast, simple,: Boost sales by offering a fast, simple, and secure checkout experience.By enabling this feature, you agree to {{stripeLink}}Stripe{{/stripeLink}}, {{appleLink}}Apple{{/appleLink}}, and {{googleLink}}Google{{/googleLink}}'s terms of use.
Set the number of days until expiration: Set the number of days until expiration from 0 to 60 days. The default is 3 days.

OXXO is a Mexican chain of convenience s: OXXO is a Mexican chain of convenience stores that allows customers to pay bills and online purchases in-store with cash.
Boleto is an official payment method in: Boleto is an official payment method in Brazil. Customers receive a voucher that can be paid at authorised agencies or banks, ATMs, or online bank portals.

Are you sure you want to disconnect your: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Stripe account from your WooCommerce store?
%s requires activation in your {{stripeD: %s requires activation in your {{stripeDashboardLink}}Stripe dashboard{{/stripeDashboardLink}}. Follow the instructions there and check back soon.
Multibanco is an interbank network that: Multibanco is an interbank network that links the ATMs of all major banks in Portugal, allowing customers to pay through either their ATM or online banking environment.
Alipay is a popular wallet in China, ope: Alipay is a popular wallet in China, operated by Ant Financial Services Group, a financial services provider affiliated with Alibaba.

You can add it again at any time in Stri: You can add it again at any time in Stripe settings.
You must capture the payment on the orde: You must capture the payment on the order details screen within 7 days of authorisation, otherwise the money will return to the shopper.

When enabled, payment methods powered by: When enabled, payment methods powered by Stripe will appear on checkout.
When enabled, payment error logs will be: When enabled, payment error logs will be saved to WooCommerce > Status > Logs.
When enabled, we'll include the order nu: When enabled, we'll include the order number for card and express checkout transactions.
Add customer order number to the bank st: Add customer order number to the bank statement
Charge must be captured on the order det: Charge must be captured on the order details screen within 7 days of authorisation, otherwise the authorisation and order will be canceled.

If enabled, the credit card form will di: If enabled, the credit card form will display separate credit card number field, expiry date field and CVC field.
Payments\/payouts may be disabled for th: Payments/payouts may be disabled for this account until missing business information is updated. Update now
Accept secure bank transfers from Austri: Accept secure bank transfers from Austria, Belgium, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, and Spain.
Reach 500 million customers and over 20: Reach 500 million customers and over 20 million businesses across the European Union.
Przelewy24 is a Poland-based payment met: Przelewy24 is a Poland-based payment method aggregator that allows customers to complete transactions online using bank transfers and other methods.
iDEAL is a Netherlands-based payment met: iDEAL is a Netherlands-based payment method that allows customers to complete transactions online using their bank credentials.
Expand your business with giropay \u2014: Expand your business with giropay — Germany’s second most popular payment system.
EPS is an Austria-based payment method t: EPS is an Austria-based payment method that allows customers to complete transactions online using their bank credentials.
Let your customers pay with major credit: Let your customers pay with major credit and debit cards without leaving your store.
Bancontact is the most popular online pa: Bancontact is the most popular online payment method in Belgium, with over 15 million cards in circulation.
Let your customers use their favorite ex: Let your customers use their favorite express payment methods and digital wallets for faster, more secure checkouts across different parts of your store.
Select payments available to customers a: Select payments available to customers at checkout. Based on their device type, location, and purchase history, your customers will only see the most relevant payment methods.
Enable or disable Stripe on your store,: Enable or disable Stripe on your store, enter activation keys, and turn on test mode to simulate transactions.

If enabled, users will be able to pay wi: If enabled, users will be able to pay with a saved card during checkout. Card details are saved on Stripe servers, not on your store.
